tool_description:
🔥🔥中文语录合集，包含土味情话、鸡汤、笑话、朋友圈文案、高攻击力骂人语句、哲学、文学等。

Contains Cheesy pick up lines, chicken soup, adult jokes, weird dialogues, curse words, philosophy, literature and more.
name: Collection of Chinese Quotations
title: Collection of Chinese Quotations

api_list.name: Get quotes 获取语录
api_list.description:
**根据指定类型返回一条随机语录。**
**Returns a random quote based on the specified type.**

optional_parameters.name: encode
optional_parameters.description:
**返回形式，若无则返回纯文本** **Form of the return value, text if null**
值说明
text返回纯文本
json返回JSON文本
js返回JavaScript的文本
Value Description
text Returns plain text
json Returns JSON text
js Returns JavaScript text

optional_parameters.name: c
optional_parameters.description:
